review: Exactly what was stated in the description. Came in a quick and timely manner. 5 stars
author: Michael Cauble

review: We tend to entertain friends at our home weekly. Most of our friends are photographers, work in the film industry, and writers who constantly want to share their latest shoot or a movie trailer. We've never had an elegant solution for this until getting the Chromecast. We either had to pass around a phone, open a laptop, or use dumb "smart" apps on our TV. Now they simply open what they want to share and it instantly pops up on our 60" display. The process is seamless and simple.
author: Kelly

review: Love it. Very practical and easy to use. Highly recommend it!
author: Janille Lawson
